entry.title: Tuesday: Drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
